Anne Becker

  1. Foster Name: Anne Mary Gurski
  2. Foster Family: Peter and Regina Gurski
  3. Location of Family: Petersburg, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1910-12-18, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2002-09-16, Alexandria, MN
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Anne Rooney
  11. Spouse Name: Vincent Osman Rooney
  12. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; National Orphan Train Complex; www.treetwigs - Notes for Anna Mary Gurski.
